short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension by and for Shortcut power users. Adds AI functionality, keyboard shortcuts, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Search for Shortcut stories from anywhere using the Omnibox `sc` shortcut
- Use keyboard shortcuts to change a story's status, estimate, iteration or copy the git branch name
- Ask GPT for implementation questions based on story description or to break up stories 
- Displays days a story has been in development and review
- Displays final cycle time on completed stories
- Add your own personal notes for every story
- Easily add to-dos straight from stories


Shortcut Assistant is managed by an independent developer and has no affiliation with Shortcut
